resources.string: Mode will be used in next «Do not disturb» enabled

Application is created to solve the «Do not disturb» glitch on Xiaomi/Redmi smartphones of global versions.

On the main screen of the application, we can choose which mode will be set in the smartphone when activating the system «Do not disturb»

For the correct operation of the application, it is necessary to grant the necessary rights, the dialog will open by clicking on «Let permission»
Seems like application has no permission, check permission
Choose mode, which will be used on system «DND» activated
